error.message: Class Drupal\die_in_twig\DieInTwigExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
